name: Cruisin' The Waves
description:
By Romy K. and Megan M.

In our game we are controlling a wave that helps a surfer surf. We have to avoid obstacles such as birds, sharks and trash. The goal of our game is to get the highest points possible with only three lives.

Controls:

  • Hold Up arrow to move up
  • Hold Down arrow to move down
  • Hold shift to increase your speed
developers: NYU Game Center - High School Programs
